oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Standardized Performance Analysis Update
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McGrann, James M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Standardized Performance Analysis
SPA
National Cattlemen's Association
software
education materials
beef cattle
Integrated Resource Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Standardized Performance Analysis (SPA) methodology, guidelines, software, and education materials for beef cattle was developed out of an initiative of the National Cattlemen's Association (NCA) producers as part of the Integrated Resource Management (IRM) effort. The SPA committees involve producers and Extension specialists, primarily animal scientists, veterinarians, and agricultural economist.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1994; 111-116
